name: Increase Uber Key and Ancient Statue Droprate
description: Multiply the probability for uber keys and ancient statues to drop.
author: Jobus

config.name: Key Probability Multiplier
config.description: Increase the probability that uber keys drop from the Countess, Summoner, and Nihlathak in Hell by this multiplier.

config.name: Statue Probability Multiplier
config.description: Increase the probability that colossal ancient statues drop by this multiplier.
